      • runScript

        public void runScript(InputStream in,
                      String filename)
        Runs a script from an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        in - the InputStream loading the script to be executed
        filename - the script filename (or at least its extension)

      • runScript

        public void runScript(String path)
        Runs a (JARified) BAR script.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the BAR script to be executed, e.g, scripts/BAR/Data_Analysis/Distribution_Plotter.ijm;

      • runScript

        public void runScript(String path,
                      Map<String,Object> inputMap)
        Runs a (JARified) BAR script.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the BAR script to be executed, e.g, /scripts/BAR/Data_Analysis/Distribution_Plotter.ijm;
        inputMap - see ScriptService.run(String, Reader, boolean, Map)

      • runScript

        public void runScript(String dir,
                      String file,
                      Map<String,Object> inputMap)
        Runs a (JARified) BAR script.
        Parameters:
        dir - the script directory, i.e., the subdirectory in the BAR jar relative to scripts/BAR/
        file - the script filename (or at least its extension)
        inputMap - see ScriptService.run(String, Reader, boolean, Map)

      • runScript

        public void runScript(String dir,
                      String file)
        Runs a (JARified) BAR script.
        Parameters:
        dir - the script directory, i.e., the subdirectory in the BAR jar relative to scripts/BAR/
        file - the script filename

      • runScript

        public void runScript(InputStream in,
                      String filename,
                      Map<String,Object> inputMap)
        Runs a script from a jar file.
        Parameters:
        in - the InputStream loading the script to be executed
        filename - the script filename (or at least its extension)
        inputMap - see ScriptService.run(String, Reader, boolean, Map)

      • runBARMacro

        public void runBARMacro(String path,
                        String arg)
        Legacy method that supports IJ1 macros that do not use script parameters. Ported from Macro_Runner.runMacroFromJar(String, String).
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the IJ1 macro in the BAR jar file relative to scripts/
        arg - the argument string to be retrieved through the IJ1 built-in macro function getArgument()

      • runIJ1Macro

        public void runIJ1Macro(String path,
                        String arg)
        Legacy method that supports IJ1 macros that do not use script parameters. Ported from Macro_Runner.runMacroFromJar(String, String).
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the IJ1 macro in the BAR jar file
        arg - the argument string to be retrieved through the IJ1 built-in macro function getArgument()

      • installIJ1Macro

        public void installIJ1Macro(String path)

      • installIJ1Macro

        public void installIJ1Macro(String path,
                            boolean singleTool)

      • readContents

        public String readContents(String resourcePath)

      • readContents

        public String readContents(URL url,
                           boolean setGlobalFlags)

      • isSilent

        public Boolean isSilent()
        return true if the LogService is not logging errors. Note that passing invalid parameters to scripts may still trigger Console warnings.

      • setSilent

        public void setSilent(Boolean silent)
        Should LogService display errors?
        Parameters:
        silent - if true errors are ignored silently. Note that passing invalid parameters to scripts may still trigger Console warnings.

      • scriptLoaded

        public boolean scriptLoaded()
        Assesses if last script was loaded successfully
        Returns:
        true if the last run script could not be loaded otherwise false

      • getStatus

        public String getStatus()
        Returns:
        the exit status: cancelled, done, exception, loaded, io error, or in the case of IJ1 macros loaded through legacy mechanisms the String value returned by the Macro_Runner.runMacro(String, String)

      • openLastLoadedResource

        public void openLastLoadedResource()

      • getLastLoadedResource

        public File getLastLoadedResource()
